siteMetadata.title: Anton's blog, Azure cloud and all things infrastructure related
siteMetadata.subtitle: My insights, analysis and tips to share with dev community

frontmatter.title: Automate Let's Encrypt wildcard certificate deployment to an Azure VM
frontmatter.description: Automating TLS certificate issuing via Let's Encrypt is very straight-forward in new emerging orchestrators like Kubernetes. Achieving the same on a virtual machine running IIS is still very much in demand, but the process is not well documented and a little bit more difficult to get right.

frontmatter.title: How does a single VM performance compare to multiple VMs? (Windows Server/IIS)
frontmatter.description: Having you ever wondered if 2 VMs would provide the same level of performance in IIS as a single VM of double the size? The following analysis will attempt to answer the question.
